answer: John Carter is a 2012 American science fiction action film directed by Andrew Stanton and starring Taylor Kitsch, Lynn Collins, Samantha Morton, Mark Strong, Ciar√°n Hinds, Thomas Haden Church, Willem Dafoe, Dominic West, and James Purefoy.
